HomeSubheading: Provide funding for your initial transactions
Text1: 1. The amount of $Novai claimed each time is enough for up to two transactions
Text2: 2. Each address can only claim once
Text3: 3. Each IP address can only claim once within 24 hours
Text4: 4. The number of addresses receiving rewards per hour cannot exceed 10,000
TipsCenter: You will receive the tokens in approximately 2 minutes
